pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ndex-pythonThis repository stores all of the code we are going to release under the name 'ndex' on PyPi.API documention can be found here: http://ndexbio.github.io/ndex-python/index.htmlPlease Note:Anything in the ndex.beta package is subject to radically change or even be deleted without notice. This area is mostly intended for close collaborators.
